notes:
Only appears during the [[Warpath Mini World Change]].

You can face this [[boss]] once every 24 hours. After killing her you will get kicked out of her camp in 2 minutes and won't be able to reenter until there's no cooldown. Note that if you try to face Bibby again before the cooldown is over it will '''reset''' and you'll have to wait another 24 hours. 

Her name is most probably an allusion to Bibby Blocksberg, famous little witch from 80's children book and television series.

{{JSpoiler|When you kill her, you will earn the [[achievement]] [[Bibby's Bloodbath]].}}

sounds: Don't run, you'll just lose precious fat.
name: Bibby Bloodbath
behaviour: Will fight in close combat while spamming her [[Melee|Yellow Spark Exori]] and going [[invisible]] from time to time.
location: North of the [[Jakundaf Desert]] located ({{Mapper Coords|127.176|125.42|7|8|text=here}}), north of [[Carlin]] ({{Mapper Coords|126.90|123.232|7|8|text=here}}) or east of the [[Femor Hills]] ({{Mapper Coords|127.110|124.85|7|8|text=here}}).
strategy: [[Knight]]s with medium [[skills]] can kill it easily, and so can [[Paladin]]s. [[Sorcerer]]s and [[Druid]]s should use [[Magic Shield]] and [[Sudden Death Rune]]s.
